getPlayerId().Description: Retrieves the ID of this player.

getDisplayName().Description: Retrieves the display name for this player.

Returns: Whether the player has an icon-size profile image to display.
hasIconImage().Description: Indicates whether this player has an icon-size profile image to display.

Returns: The timestamp (in ms since epoch) at which the player last played a multiplayer game with the currently signed in user.
getLastPlayedWithTimestamp().Description: Retrieves the timestamp at which this player last played a multiplayer game with the currently signed in user. If the timestamp is not found, this method returns @B_com#google#android#gms#games#Player#TIMESTAMP_UNKNOWN_E@.

Returns: The player's title, or null if this player has no title.
getTitle().Description: Retrieves the title of the player. This is based on the player's gameplay activity in apps using Google Play Games services. Note that not all players have titles, and that a player's title may change over time.

Returns: The image URI for the player's hi-res profile image, or null if the player has none.
getHiResImageUri().Description: Retrieves the URI for loading this player's hi-res profile image. Returns null if the player has no profile image. To retrieve the Image from the @B_android#net#Uri_E@, use @B_com#google#android#gms#common#images#ImageManager_E@.

Returns: The @B_com#google#android#gms#games#PlayerLevelInfo_E@ associated with this player, if any.
getLevelInfo().Description: Retrieves the player level associated information if any exists. If no level information exists for this player, this method will return null.

Returns: The timestamp (in ms since epoch) at which the player data was last updated locally.
getRetrievedTimestamp().Description: Retrieves the timestamp at which this player record was last updated locally.

Parameters: The buffer to load the data into.
getTitle(android.database.CharArrayBuffe.Description: Loads the player's title into the given @B_android#database#CharArrayBuffer_E@.

Parameters: The buffer to load the data into.
getDisplayName(android.database.CharArra.Description: Loads the player's display name into the given @B_android#database#CharArrayBuffer_E@.

Returns: The image URI for the player's icon-size profile image, or null if the player has none.
getIconImageUri().Description: Retrieves the URI for loading this player's icon-size profile image. Returns null if the player has no profile image. To retrieve the Image from the @B_android#net#Uri_E@, use @B_com#google#android#gms#common#images#ImageManager_E@.

Returns: Whether the player has a hi-res profile image to display.
hasHiResImage().Description: Indicates whether this player has a hi-res profile image to display.

ClassDesc: Data interface for retrieving player information.
